item.title: The Five Most Common Sports Injuries
item.description: While playing sports can be very beneficial to your health, all sports carry some risk of injury. The severity of these injuries can range from minor to very serious, with some more severe injuries requiring surgery to fully correct. Injury can result from poor training practices, improper equipment, flawed techniques, or simply by accident.
